entry.tran: 伊玛目(指伊斯兰教的宗教领袖,尤指穆斯林社群领袖或清真寺内带领教徒做礼拜的人)
entry.def: In Islam, an imam is a religious leader, especially the leader of a Muslim community or the person who leads the prayers in a mosque.

means.word_mean: 1. (Islam) the man who leads prayers in a mosque; for Shiites an imam is a recognized authority on Islamic theology and law and a spiritual guide
